instruction: Generate a self-introduction for a job interview.
output: Hello, my name is [name], and I am excited to be here for my interview today. I recently graduated from [name of school] with a degree in [field of study]. I am highly motivated to apply my skills and knowledge gained from my studies to benefit the organization. I am an organized and dedicated professional, with experience in [field of expertise] and a passion for learning and innovative solutions. I am confident that my experience, enthusiasm and drive make me an ideal candidate for this position.
